title: Peer conducted behaviour modification (TEFC)
creator_credit: Steven D McAdam and Phillip R. Blake
brief_description: Drs. Clement and Paterson discuss the roles of peers in child therapy. The film shows a program at the Oregon Institute which, having found that the child’s peers can undermine the work of both psychologists and parents, uses other children to reinforce the behaviour therapy.
